info.name: Gmail Login Totally Clean
info.description: Gmail Login Totally Clean is a cleaner/minimalist version of Gmail White Stripped Login Screen, which you can see here at: http://userstyles.org/styles/38597/gmail-white-stripped-login-screen?r=1338020443. Try it if you're a fan of minimalist things. Enjoy! :) Full Screenshots: Login Screen: http://cl.ly/0Q1G233A063r0Y3Y2L0P Inbox: http://cl.ly/3W1r0b1q3u0Q371x3c22
info.additionalInfo:
Last update: September 2,  2013
Version: 1.5

Overview: Giving the fact Google is always working to improve the design consistency of its web apps, I've just come with this update in order to keep the project alive. I hope you like it!

Change log:

- Fixed Google's top bar with suggested services
- New custom style to reflect the changes for the new Gmail's Login Screen - Last updated on: May 26,  2012
- Ads removal / No ads distraction or links for other Google products after you login with your Gmail's account
- Kept it simple, no custom backgrounds, no ads, just a clean login screen and e-mails!
